com.funzio.pure2D.containers

Class HScroll

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.funzio.pure2D.BaseDisplayObject
      • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.DisplayGroup
        • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.LinearGroup
          • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.HGroup
            • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.HWheel
              • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.HScroll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animator.AnimatorListener, Cacheable, Container, List, Wheel, Contentable, DisplayObject, InvalidateFlags, Manipulatable, Touchable, UIObject

    public class HScroll
extends HWheel
implements List
    List is an extended Wheel that also handles masking and snapping. Mainly used for UI.
